item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: June 17, 2024 Today's Verse Luke 6:35â€“36 [35] But love your enemies, and do good, and lend, expecting nothing in return, and your reward will be great, and you will be sons of the Most High, for he is kind to the ungrateful and the evil. [36] Be merciful, even as your Father is merciful. Today's Memory Verse James 1:22 - But be doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving yourselves.
